email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai.

Details:
- Cargo Size: 85000MT
- Incoterm: CIF
- Vessel: PACIFIC STAR
- Freight Quote: USD 22 per MT
- Laycan: 25-30 September

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Can you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, is there any flexibility on the freight rate?

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
Blue Ocean Charter

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

PACIFIC STAR has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290m. Given the current market conditions, I can offer a revised rate of USD 20 per MT.

Please let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised rate. We are also looking at a laytime start date of 2023-09-28. Can you confirm if this is feasible and provide the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Laytime Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Laytime start date of 2023-09-28 is confirmed. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day.

Please confirm if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Rate Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

The demurrage rate is acceptable. However, we would like to finalize the freight rate at USD 19 per MT. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Rate Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 19 per MT is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Lucas
